Articles.Content: I would like to to a SpaceX style faring recovery but I would need solid fairings that are counted as a separate craft. Does anyone know some suitable mods that would also be compatible with 1.7.3?
Don't know of an add-on.  But if you patched a probe core and reaction wheels to the fairing sides in any of the parts packs that have them separate from the fairing bases that should do the trick.
